+     def _browse_directory(self):

+             title="GGUFãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªã‚’é¸æŠ",
+             initialdir=self.last_directory or os.getcwd()

+         
+         if directory:
+             self.dir_var.set(directory)
+             self.last_directory = directory
+             self._save_last_directory()
+             self._scan_gguf_files()

+     def _scan_gguf_files(self):
+         """GGUFãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ³"""
+         directory = self.dir_var.get().strip()
+         
+         if not directory:
+             messagebox.showwarning("è­¦å‘Š", "ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªã‚’é¸æŠã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„")
+             return
+         
+         if not os.path.exists(directory):
+             messagebox.showerror("ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼", "æŒ‡å®šã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªãŒå­˜åœ¨ã—ã¾ã›ã‚“")
+             return
+         
+         try:
+             self.available_models = []
+             path = Path(directory)
+             
+             # .ggufãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’å†å¸°çš„ã«æ¤œç´¢
+             gguf_files = list(path.rglob('*.gguf'))
+             
+             for file_path in gguf_files:
+                 relative_path = file_path.relative_to(path)
+                 file_size = file_path.stat().st_size / (1024 * 1024)  # MB
+                 
+                 model_info = {
+                     'path': str(file_path),
+                     'name': str(relative_path),
+                     'size_mb': round(file_size, 2)
+                 }
+                 self.available_models.append(model_info)
+             
+             self._update_model_list()
+             
+             if self.available_models:
+                 messagebox.showinfo("æˆåŠŸ", f"{len(self.available_models)}å€‹ã®GGUFãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ç™ºè¦‹ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ")
+             else:
+                 messagebox.showwarning("è­¦å‘Š", "GGUFãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ãŒè¦‹ã¤ã‹ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã§ã—ãŸ")
+                 
+         except Exception as e:
+             messagebox.showerror("ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼", f"ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ³ä¸­ã«ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒç™ºç”Ÿã—ã¾ã—ãŸ: {e}")
+     
+     def _update_model_list(self):
+         """ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’æ›´æ–°"""
+         self.model_listbox.delete(0, tk.END)
+         
+         for model_info in self.available_models:
+             display_text = f"{model_info['name']} ({model_info['size_mb']} MB)"
+             self.model_listbox.insert(tk.END, display_text)
+     
+     def _refresh_models(self):
+         """ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’æ›´æ–°"""
+         self._scan_gguf_files()
+     
+     def _select_model(self):
+         """é¸æŠã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ã‚’å–å¾—"""
+         selection = self.model_listbox.curselection()
+         
+         if not selection:
+             messagebox.showwarning("è­¦å‘Š", "ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ã‚’é¸æŠã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„")
+             return
+         
+         selected_index = selection[0]
+         selected_model = self.available_models[selected_index]
+         
+         self.selected_model_path = selected_model['path']
+         self.selected_label.config(
+             text=f"é¸æŠ: {selected_model['name']}", 
+             foreground="green"
+         )
+         
+         # ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒãƒƒã‚¯é–¢æ•°ã‚’å‘¼ã³å‡ºã—
+         if self.on_model_selected:
+             self.on_model_selected(selected_model)
+         
+         # è¨­å®šã‚’ä¿å­˜
+         self._save_selected_model(selected_model)
+     
+     def _on_double_click(self, event):
+         """ãƒ€ãƒ–ãƒ«ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯ã§é¸æŠ"""
+         self._select_model()
+     
+     def _clear_selection(self):
+         """é¸æŠã‚’ã‚¯ãƒªã‚¢"""
+         self.selected_model_path = None
+         self.selected_label.config(text="é¸æŠãªã—", foreground="gray")
+         self.model_listbox.selection_clear(0, tk.END)
+     
+     def _load_last_directory(self) -> str:
+         """æœ€å¾Œã«ä½¿ç”¨ã—ãŸãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªã‚’èª­ã¿è¾¼ã¿"""
+         try:
+             if self.config_file.exists():
+                 with open(self.config_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
+                     config = json.load(f)
+                     return config.get('last_directory', '')
+         except Exception:
+             pass
+         return ""
+     
+     def _save_last_directory(self):
+         """æœ€å¾Œã«ä½¿ç”¨ã—ãŸãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªã‚’ä¿å­˜"""
+         try:
+             config = {
+                 'last_directory': self.last_directory,
+                 'selected_models': self._get_saved_models()
+             }
+             with open(self.config_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
+                 json.dump(config, f, ensure_ascii=False, indent=2)
+         except Exception as e:
+             print(f"è¨­å®šä¿å­˜ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼: {e}")
+     
+     def _save_selected_model(self, model_info: Dict):
+         """é¸æŠã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ã‚’ä¿å­˜"""
+         try:
+             saved_models = self._get_saved_models()
+             saved_models.append(model_info)
+             
+             # é‡è¤‡ã‚’é™¤å»
+             unique_models = []
+             seen_paths = set()
+             for model in saved_models:
+                 if model['path'] not in seen_paths:
+                     unique_models.append(model)
+                     seen_paths.add(model['path'])
+             
+             # æœ€æ–°ã®5å€‹ã®ã¿ä¿æŒ
+             if len(unique_models) > 5:
+                 unique_models = unique_models[-5:]
+             
+             config = {
+                 'last_directory': self.last_directory,
+                 'selected_models': unique_models
+             }
+             
+             with open(self.config_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
+                 json.dump(config, f, ensure_ascii=False, indent=2)
+                 
+         except Exception as e:
+             print(f"ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ä¿å­˜ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼: {e}")
+     
+     def _get_saved_models(self) -> List[Dict]:
+         """ä¿å­˜ã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ä¸€è¦§ã‚’å–å¾—"""
+         try:
+             if self.config_file.exists():
+                 with open(self.config_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
+                     config = json.load(f)
+                     return config.get('selected_models', [])
+         except Exception:
+             pass
+         return []
+     
+     def _load_saved_models(self):
+         """ä¿å­˜ã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ã‚’èª­ã¿è¾¼ã¿"""
+         saved_models = self._get_saved_models()
+         if saved_models:
+             self.available_models = saved_models
+             self._update_model_list()
+     
+     def get_selected_model_path(self) -> Optional[str]:
+         """é¸æŠã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ãƒ‘ã‚¹ã‚’å–å¾—"""
+         return self.selected_model_path
+     
+     def get_available_models(self) -> List[Dict]:
+         """åˆ©ç”¨å¯èƒ½ãªãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ä¸€è¦§ã‚’å–å¾—"""
+         return self.available_models.copy()
+     
+     def set_directory(self, directory: str):
+         """ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªã‚’è¨­å®š"""
+         self.dir_var.set(directory)
+         self.last_directory = directory
+         self._save_last_directory()
+     
+     def refresh(self):
+         """ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’æ›´æ–°"""
+         self._load_saved_models()
+ 
+ def create_gguf_selector_dialog(parent: tk.Widget, title: str = "GGUFãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«é¸æŠ") -> Optional[str]:
+     """GGUFãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«é¸æŠãƒ€ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ­ã‚°ã‚’ä½œæˆ"""
+     dialog = tk.Toplevel(parent)
+     dialog.title(title)
+     dialog.geometry("600x500")
+     dialog.resizable(True, True)
+     
+     # ãƒ€ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ­ã‚°ã‚’ãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ«ã«ã™ã‚‹
+     dialog.transient(parent)
+     dialog.grab_set()
+     
+     selected_path = None
+     
+     def on_model_selected(model_info: Dict):
+         nonlocal selected_path
+         selected_path = model_info['path']
+         dialog.destroy()
+     
+     selector = GGUFModelSelector(dialog, on_model_selected)
+     
+     # ãƒ€ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ­ã‚°ãŒé–‰ã˜ã‚‰ã‚Œã‚‹ã¾ã§å¾…æ©Ÿ
+     dialog.wait_window()
+     
+     return selected_path
+ 
+ if __name__ == "__main__":
+     # ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆç”¨

+     root.geometry("700x600")

+     selector = GGUFModelSelector(root)
+     
+     def test_selection():
+         selected = selector.get_selected_model_path()

+     def scan_custom_directory(self, directory: str) -> List[str]:
+         """æŒ‡å®šã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªã‹ã‚‰GGUFãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ³"""

+                 self.logger.warning(f"âš ï¸ æŒ‡å®šã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªãŒå­˜åœ¨ã—ã¾ã›ã‚“: {directory}")
